title: Package Design
subTitle: For Mars by Ghc
description: "Based on team insights and user research, design user-centric solutions using data, prototypes, and mock-ups. Monitor trends, refine products, and outdo competitors."

title: UI/UX Application
subTitle: Development Process
description: "An instructional design project tailored for aspiring junior designers seeking a comprehensive understanding of the end-to-end brand development process."

title: Terra Tea
subTitle: A Blend of Earth
description:
"TerraTea embodies the synergy of wholesomeness and nature, offering a
mindful pause within our hectic days through
its organic offerings."

title: SGT Rice
subTitle:
A Legacy of Quality and 
Commitment to Farmer
description: "Exploring the 30-year journey of SGT Rice, a brand rooted in collaboration and quality, this thesis delves into rice production complexities, emphasizing industry challenges and unwavering commitment to health and quality."
